text: haey avei del puok anak ban phdal chea kar brak daembi chngaoy vea kaen knong tropy sa mb tde anakadtei noh ku vea min kaen champoh a l laoh laey . te avei del puok anak ban brichcheak hsaa kat daembi chngban kar ylprom pi a l laoh anak teangnoh kuchea anak del ttuol bankar bratan da chraen leusalb
